snippet: Directors at London-listed blue-chip companies earned 21 percent more in the 2013/14 financial year thanks to a steep rise in long-term incentives, a report showed on Monday....

headline.print_headline: Earnings of FTSE 100 Executives Rise a Fifth as Incentives Climb
headline.main: Earnings of FTSE 100 Executives Rise a Fifth as Incentives Climb

lead_paragraph: Directors at London-listed blue-chip companies earned 21 percent more in the 2013/14 financial year thanks to a steep rise in long-term incentives, a report showed on Monday.
